summary: efi: ssdt: Don't free memory if ACPI table was loaded successfully
details:
efi: ssdt: Don't free memory if ACPI table was loaded successfully

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.4 by commit 11497fd69cd2282538ec6eb4cda1d16fc061233d, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 3881ee0b1edce0ece72d24b7c74f46b73bd6dcba. For more details please see the references link.
